src:
Torehan Ini Buat Wonderkid Arsenal Ini Terlihat Lebih Baik dari Neymar
01 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal harus menelan kekalahan pahit atas Liverpool di ajang Carabao Cup hari Kamis (31/10/2019) kemarin. Meskipun demikian, mereka tetap mendapatkan kabar baik yang berkaitan dengan salah satu wonderkid miliknya, Gabriel Martinelli.
Sebagai informasi, Arsenal dan Liverpool bermain imbang dengan skor fantastis 5-5 di waktu normal. The Reds lantas keluar sebagai pemenang setelah berhasil memenangkan drama adu penalti dengan skor 5-4.
Dua dari lima gol the Gunners yang bersarang di gawang Liverpool diborong oleh Martinelli seorang diri. Sementara tiga lainnya dicetak masing-masing oleh Lucas Torreira, Ainsley Maitland-Niles, serta Joe Willock.
Skuat besutan Unai Emery itu harus keluar dari Anfield sambil tertunduk lesu. Tetapi, satu torehan dari Martinelli yang masih berumur 18 tahun itu mungkin bisa jadi hiburan bagi mereka.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
This nick makes this Arsenal Wonderkid look better than Neymar
Nov 01 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal must swallow a bitter defeat against Liverpool in the Carabao Cup event on Thursday (10/31/2019) yesterday. Even so, they still get good news relating to one of his wonderkids, Gabriel Martinelli.
For information, Arsenal and Liverpool draw with a fantastic score of 5-5 in normal time. The Reds then came out as winners after winning the drama shootout with a score of 5-4.
Two of the Gunners' five goals nestled in Liverpool's goal were bought up by Martinelli alone. While the other three were printed respectively by Lucas Torreira, Ainsley Maitland-Niles, and Joe Willock.
The squad made by Unai Emery had to get out of Anfield while looking down. However, a nick of Martinelli who was still 18 years old might be able to be entertainment for them.

Scroll down to read full information.
